title: Data Leak Crisis
outcome: A city-wide data leak exposes BCI scores and private details of trusted citizens and officials, triggering panic, public anger, and power struggles within the Council. Information control becomes an obsession, eroding trust and creating an atmosphere of paranoia. The Harmonists struggle for calm while the Directorate imposes abrupt measures to restore order, and Innovators push for radical system changes.

events.description: A sudden glitch releases partial BCI score histories and personal details for thousands, including minor officials and prominent city residents. Social media surges with outrage and speculation.

The Council meets in emergency session, with Directorate proposing new censorship and surveillance to contain the leak. Harmonists urge a public apology to calm citizens, encountering strong opposition.
Demonstrations and minor vandalism erupt in high-score neighborhoods after leaked risk flags cause public shaming. Many attempt to 'prove' their compliance in bizarre public displays.
The Innovators quietly pitch a complete shift to a new, more transparent BCI system, hoping to capitalize on chaos and undermine Directorate credibility.
Targeted information blackouts begin in select districts. Rumors grow about shadow factions and lost control. Paranoia and distrust spread among both citizens and Council.
